pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to 'Sunlight' Foundation 'APIs' // Interface to 'APIs' for US government data previously under the 'Sunlight' Foundation, now under 'ProPublica' (https://www.propublica.org/datastore/'apis'), and Open States (http://docs.openstates.org/en/latest/api/). Functions are provided to interact with each of the routes in each API.
